name: the Strange Thing
description:
the Strange Thing is a racing/drifting 80's style of a game. Enjoy flawless graphics, physics and music all at once!Features:
  • Realistic Vehicle physics
  • Vehicle Modifications
  • x2 Vehicles (German Classic & Japanese Drifter)
  • Freeroam
  • Drift Trial
Vehicle Controls:
  • Arrow Keys to Drive
  • Space to Break
  • F to use Nitro
  • L to turn on/off lights

Multi-Player and Co-Op will be coming in January of 2018.
